briefdescription.para: Initializes offload array from offload data.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to offload array which is allocated here
number of markers that will be simulated

briefdescription.para: Sum offload data arrays as one.

detaileddescription.para: The data in both arrays have identical order so distributions can be summed trivially. For orbits and transport coefficients the first array already have space for appending the orbit data from the second array, so we only need to move those elements.

parameterdescription.para: the array to which array2 is summed
the array which is to be summed

briefdescription.para: Collects diagnostics when marker represents a particle.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the end of current time-step
pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the beginning of current time-step

briefdescription.para: Collects diagnostics when marker represents a guiding center.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the end of current time-step
pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the beginning of current time-step

briefdescription.para: Collects diagnostics when marker represents a magnetic field line.

detaileddescription.para: Distributions are not updated for magnetic field lines.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the end of current time-step
pointer to SIMD struct storing marker states at the beginning of current time-step
